attributes.action: Cap the cost of disability aids
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please stop making parents and carers pay 6 times the cost for disability items as "normal" items are not this cost, and are tested to the same standard for example a car seat for a child can cost between £120-£300 but for a special needs child can be up and over £1000, this is taking advantage of parents and carers whom have had to stop working to look after a disabled child and are now on a low income.
